synopsis: In the series opener, the Higehige-Dan are after the Cosmo Diamond, which is located on Planet Bomber. When Mighty gets there after visiting White Bomber, Mujyou, the commander of the Higehige-Dan, has White Bomber as a hostage. Will Mighty get his brother back, will the Higehige-Dan get the Cosmo Diamond??

In the beginning, Shout is delivering Ramen, when White Bomber and Rui crash into her. They go to meet Dr. Ein, who allows White Bomber to join the Jetterz, because of ""Kone"". His first mission with the Jetterz is to stop the Higehige-Dan from stealing the Kousumo-Zaorusu egg on Planet Hatsuketsu. When they arrive, will the Jetterz and their newest member, White Bomber, be able to stop Mujyou and save the egg?

This time, the Higehige-Dan are aiming for the ""Beckoning Cat of Happiness"", the treasure of Bajira, a millionaire who lives on Sorabakka Planet. When the Jetterz arrive, they see that the Higehige-Dan got caught in one of the traps that White Bomber set up. But, Dr. Mechadoc reveals his new invention; ""The Bomberman Making Machine"". The new machine makes ""Bat Bomber"", which is made of a bat and the Beckoning Cat of Happiness. Will White Bomber and the Jetterz be able to defeat the new Bomberman Making Machine, which created the Bat Bomber and get Bajira's treasure back??

Episode Preview:   the Higehige-dan will aim for the only perfume of its kind in the universe. Jetterz, time to go! What?! The Cosmo Jetter isn't there! WHAT?!? White Bomber took it without permission?! Episode 4: White Bomber, Launched Without Permission

Episode Preview:   we'll be exploring the underground with the Drill Jetter! A breathtaking and exciting quest! (White Bomber)Shout, I have to go to the bathroom. (Shout) WHAT?! Episode 5, Beneath the Ground: Go! Go! Go!
Episode Preview:   a mysterious man suddenly appears before us. Is he an enemy or an ally? He can throw bombs even though he isn't a Bomberman! What could he be? Episode 6: Mysterious Man, MAX.

Episode Preview:   Sometimes, it's nice to forget our responsibilities and have a picnic. Beautiful maple trees and delicious bento boxes... Well, that was the way it was supposed to go. ""An omusubi rolled away and fell into a hole."" That sounds like something I've heard before... Episode 7: Chase the Higehige-Dan!

Episode Preview:   Next time is the story of the unique Ice Rose that blooms on Sibarel Comet once every 200 years. In the language of flowers, this rose means... (Mujyou)Love I dedicate to Mama. (Shout)And why is Mujyou here? Episode 8: The Blue Rose of Memories

Episode Preview:   we're going treasure hunting using a map as a guide on planet Resort, where summer is everlasting! We have to find the treasure before the Higehige-dan does, but there's something fishy about this map, and that guy showed up again. Episode 9: Find Treasure Island!

Episode Preview:   White Bomber wanders alone in the jungle after the Sky Jetter crashes. In front of the lost White Bomber, Misty the Space Thief appears. The mysterious past between Misty and Mighty will be revealed! Episode 10: Bomb Star of the Sunset

Episode Preview:   One day, a Kyarabon baby falls from the sky! We went to Kyarabon planet to see if we could reunite it with its mother, but the Higehige-dan appeared, and- Wait, not ""Higehige"", but ""Jigejige""? Episode 11: 3000 Light Years to Find Mother!

Episode Preview:   will be about the Jetterz, who are now on Kyarabon planet's wanted list. Why did it have to turn out this way? Jeez! I don't care if it's the Higehige-dan or the Chigechige-dan, Mujou or Achou, Hiroshi or Hiroki! Please do something about this mess, White Bomber! Episode 12: Protect Kyarabon!

Episode Preview:   White Bomber thinks he's all high and mighty with his two Bomb Stars. But then, the Combined Bomberman Shitennou arrive. White Bomber, pull yourself together! If you have that attitude, you'll lose! Episode 13: White Bomber's Defeat
Episode Preview:   (Mujyou)we'll show you our daily lives for all you good kids out there. It'll be all about the Higehige-dan for the entire half-hour!! Episode 14: The Glorious Higehige-dan!

Episode Preview:   White Bomber has completely lost enthusiasm after being defeated by Fire Bomber. He was fired from the Jetterz and went home to Bomber planet! But, White Bomber, I believe in you! You will come back! Episode 15: Goodbye, Jetterz!

Episode Preview:   the Higehige-dan is doing what they please now that White Bomber isn't around. While all that is happening, White Bomber is training at his grandmother's. Best of luck, White Bomber! Episode 16: White Bomber Returns!

Episode Preview:   the Bomber Shitennou's second assassin, Mermaid Bomber, will make her debut. Her element is water. White Bomber finally came up with a new Fire Bomb, but fire is susceptible to water! Episode 17: The Glamorous Mermaid Bomber!

Episode Preview:   The Fire Bomb isn't enough to defeat Mermaid Bomber. He must learn a new Bomb skill. Bongo, Gangu. Please help White Bomber. Wait, why is he wearing underwear that have tiger stripes? Episode 18: The Sunrise Bomb of Friendship!

Episode Preview:   Only two Shitennou remain. Will it be Grand Bomber or Thunder Bomber who'll come after us next? But, just when we thought it'd be one of them... Max appeared in front of us! White Bomber gets trapped inside a cave with Max! Episode 19: Max and White Bomber.

Episode Preview:   White Bomber and I set out on a tour that lets you experience farming. Waiting there for us is the third Shitennou, Grand Bomber. Another fierce battle is about to begin, right? But then, there was a unexpected development. Episode 20: Plow On, Grand Bomber!

title.jp: The Duel at the Ancient Hot Springs Village!

synopsis: After planting the rice with Grand Bomber, White Bomber asks Grand Bomber if he wants to join the Jetterz!! Everybody like the idea, that is, except for his brother, Thunder Bomber! So Thunder Bomber comes to the planet to defeat the Jetterz once and for all, but, Grand Bomber says he will instead. Will Grand Bomber go through with his promise, and actually fight White Bomber?!?!?!

title.jp: The Longest Day Of Mighty's Life

synopsis: Episode Preview:   One day, Mighty left by himself in pursuit of the Higehige-dan. Just what happened to Mighty after he left? Now, Birdy tells the truth, at last. Episode 22: The Longest Day of Mighty's Life
Episode Preview:   I secretly followed Birdy since he's always doing things by himself. And, I saw...and heard...White Bomber, Mighty is... Mighty is... Episode 23: Shout's Tears.

Episode Preview:   Thunder Bomber, the last remaining Shitennou, appears. White Bomber goes to fight him, but then, Max appears. A fierce battle between the three begins. And I... Episode 24: Electric Thunder Bomber!
Episode Preview:   White Bomber can't accept Mighty's death. For White Bomber's sake, Birdy showed the video he got from Mujyou to White Bomber. In that video... Episode 25: The Revealed Thruth.

Episode Preview:   Max has finally launched a full-scale attack on Jetterz Planet. White Bomber, we have no time to be emotional and weak. Let's try our best, White Bomber. While our eyes are still black, we won't let Max have his way! Episode 26: Us, the Jetterz.

When Dr. Iein calls the Jetterz over to his birthday party, Gangu wonders about when his birthday is. Since nobody knows, White Bomber asks who Gangu's creator is, and Dr. Iein says it was him. So, Dr. Iein tells the story of how Gangu was created to everyone but Birdy, who left. It turns out that Bagura had a robot named ""Labrador X"", who stole all the unique items in the universe. So, Dr. Iein tried to stop him, but never could because Bagura had a giant robot. Dr. Iein's assistant, Grandma Bomber, inspired Iein to make a robot, but he had no money at the bank, so he had to give up. When he tells Grandma Bomber, she gets mad and starts throwing bombs at him, until he says he understands, and will make a robot. That robot turns out to Gangu! Gangu kept on stopping the enemy robot, and in the process, love blossomed between the two. But when Bagura realizes it, he makes Labrador X defeat Gangu. So what will happen between the two lovers?

When a big snowfall makes everybody but Birdy and Rui sick, they both have to guard the trumpet from Swing Planet by themselves, and that means Birdy has to learn what Rui is saying! But it's more trouble than they think when Mujyou has been reinstated and given the New Super Combined Bomberman Making Machine. With it, Mujoe makes Super Combined Bomberman No. 1, Wanigeta Bomber. Wanigeta Bomber is more than Birdy and Rui can handle. Will the Higehige-dan and the newly resigned commander Mujoe get away with the trumpet, or will the Jetterz stop them?

title.jp: The Melody of a Gigantic Planet

synopsis: When Birdy says he's tired of the usual Raman, the Jetterz go to get some more. When they arrive on the planet, a gigantic cat attacks and takes Shout with her.Then, White Bomber goes to rescue Shout. When he gets to the house where Shout is, he finds out that the cat is sick, and Shout is trying to find out what was wrong. White Bomber throws a Pepper Bomb, and the cat spits out Mujyou! So, Mujyou uses the ""Super Combined Bomberman Making Machine"" to turn the cat in Cat Rinrin Bomber. Will White Bomber find a plan to return Cat Rinrin Bomber to its original form, and will the Jetterz get the only bell of it's kind in the universe back?

When a strange man who looks exactly like Bongo comes to Shout's shop looking for curry, he asks Bongo to come back to Dodonpa Planet because they are having the biggest crisis since its existence. Bongo's dad Kingo has a sharp object stuck in his throat! So, the Jetterz have to go find an oasis in the Rekoreko desert with the fruit of a unique cough drop tree to get the object out of King Kingo's throat. But, there are a few problems. To get to the oasis, the Jetterz must past Sandstorm Hill, and find this wandering oasis. The Jetterz set out to find the unique item, but run into the Higehige-dan on the way. Can the Jetterz get past the Higehige-dan and save Dondonpa Planet?

When Dr. Ein makes Birdy clean one of the Jetterz' ships, he has a flashback as to why nobody uses the ship anymore. In the flashback, Mighty decides instead of stopping the Higehige-dan and getting back the unique flower-scented natto, to let them float and track them down to their HQ, where they can take back all of the stolen items from the Higehige-dan. But, when Mighty and Birdy get into their HQ, they meet Misty. Misty and Mighty fall into a booby trap which sends them into the basement, while Birdy gets away. In the basement, Mighty gives Misty back her Jetterz badge, which she lost earlier, and asks her to join the Jetterz. But, before she can say anything, Mujoe starts to self-destruct the HQ, which is actually a giant battleship! Will Mighty and Misty get out in time, or will they be caught in the explosion?

When Pui, an animal who looks just like Rui comes to Planet Bomber, he says he wants to become White Bomber's apprentice! So, since White Bomber lost to Rui at a video game, he's Rui's apprentice for the day. Rui and Pui go head-to-head in three battles to see who will be his apprentice. The third battle is a race, and during it, White Bomber sees a strange man in a coat watching from an alley. White Bomber approaches him, and the man runs, but drops his wallet. So, White Bomber chases after him. They have a talk, and he finds out the man's name is Daibon, and that he his Pui's master. Pui ran away because he said he found a Bomberman who couldn't even throw Fire Bombs was pathetic. Daibon wants Rui back, and White Bomber comes up with a plan to have Pui go back to him. When they are about to go through with the plan, White Bomber gets afraid that Rui might think he's pathetic, and starts to freak out. Will White Bomber go through with he plan and let Daibon have Pui back, or will Pui

Episode Preview:   What a suprise! The Cosmos Jetterz was made into a Super Combined Bomerman! But weren't those things supposed to be made from two things? What was the other thing, professor? Er, professor? Where has he gone? Episode 33: Iein Goes Boom!

title.jp: A Fierce Battle! B-1 Grand Prix!!

synopsis: Episode Preview:   the B-1 Grand Prix, a Bomberman Championship that takes place every four years, will take place. There are going to be many skilled Bomberman. Do your best, White Bomber! Episode 34: A Fierce Battle! B-1 Grand Prix!!

title.jp: A B-1 Match! Burn, White Bomber!

synopsis: Episode Preview:   we reach the best part of the B-1 Grand Prix. Episode 35: A B-1 Match! Burn, White Bomber!

title.jp: A Close Look at the Jetterz

synopsis: Episode Preview:   we have Bomber Zero, who won the B-1 Championships. We visit Misty because we want to know who he is, and we are shocked to learn that he is Max! But he seems different from the Max we remember ... Episode 37: Max Comes Back To Life

title.jp: New life! Hige Hige Group of darkness
The last day of Bomber Star!
